heroSubtitle1: A space for deep healing, care, and transformation with ancestral medicines.
heroSubtitle2: Discover the path to your inner self and awaken your consciousness.
upcomingCeremoniesSubtitle: Spaces designed for your transformation and spiritual growth.
preparationCtaDescription: Proper preparation is the first step towards a profound and transformative experience. Discover how to align your body, mind, and spirit for the ceremony.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social media to stay updated on our next events, share experiences, and connect with other members of our community.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to access your account.
googleSuccessDescription: You have successfully logged in with Google.
registerSubtext: Join our community and start your healing path.
registerSuccessDescription: Your account has been created. Welcome!
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is a sacred ancestral brew from the Amazon, made from the combination of two plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and the leaves of Chacruna (Psychotria viridis). For centuries, indigenous communities have used it in spiritual ceremonies to facilitate deep healing, self-discovery, and connection with the divine.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: The brew induces altered states of consciousness, allowing access to the subconscious mind. This process can reveal and heal emotional wounds, release energetic blockages, and offer profound clarity about one's life purpose. The experience is guided by sacred songs (icaros) that channel healing energy.
spiritualMasterTitle: The Spiritual Master of 'The Art of Healing'
spiritualMasterDescription: In our center, we honor Ayahuasca as a master plant and a spiritual guide. Each ceremony is a sacred space where medicine teaches us, shows us the way, and helps us reconnect with our essence. Our role is to facilitate and hold this space with the utmost respect, love, and care.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Many find answers to deep questions and a renewed sense of purpose in their lives.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Liberation from past traumas, fears, and emotional patterns that limit your well-being.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: A deep feeling of connection with oneself, others, and the universe.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared experience where the collective energy enhances individual healing. It is an opportunity to connect with others on a deep and authentic level.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized session, designed to address specific needs and intentions in a one-on-one setting with the guide.
guidesPageSubtitle: Beings of light and love, committed to the sacred service of medicine and your healing process.
editCeremonyDescription: Modify the details of the ceremony. Changes will be saved immediately.
addCeremonyDescription: Fill in the details for the new ceremony.
errorUpdatingCeremony: There was an error updating the ceremony.
errorCreatingCeremony: There was an error creating the ceremony.
deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the ceremony.
errorDeletingCeremony: There was an error deleting the ceremony.
errorDuplicatingCeremony: There was an error duplicating the ceremony.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan available up to 4 people
editGuideDescription: Modify the guide's information. The changes will be saved.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide an image/video URL or upload a file.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 20% deposit.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This will move the ceremony to the 'Past Events' section. This action can be reversed.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony has been moved to past events.
errorFinishingCeremony: There was an error marking the ceremony as finished.
noUpcomingCeremonies: There are no upcoming ceremonies at the moment. Please check back later.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage your application's content and settings.
themeTabDescription: Change the application's colors (values in HSL format).
errorRequiredDetails: Details are required if you answered 'yes'.
preparationPageTitle: Your Path to Healing: How to Prepare
preparationProcessDescription: The journey begins before the ceremony. A conscious preparation of body and mind is key.
ceremonyProcessDescription: The sacred moment of connection with the medicine, guided by icaros and deep wisdom.
experienceProcessDescription: A profound inner journey of visions, emotions, and revelations that will transform your perspective.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we accompany you in processing and applying the teachings in your daily life.
dietTitle: Sacred Diet: Nourishing the Body and Spirit
dietSubtitle: For at least one week before the ceremony, we recommend a clean and light diet to purify your body and open your spirit to the medicine.
mentalPrepSubtitle: A calm and open mind is the best vessel for the teachings of the medicine.
meditationDescription: Dedicate a few minutes each day to sit in silence, observe your breath, and calm your mind.
intentionsDescription: What are you seeking to heal or understand? Write down your intentions with clarity and humility.
reflectionDescription: Write about your thoughts, fears, and hopes. It is a powerful tool for self-discovery.
emotionalHealingDescription: The ceremony can be an intense emotional journey. The key is to surrender, trust, and allow. Let go of control and allow the medicine to show you what you need to see. Remember that every emotion that arises is an opportunity for healing. We will be there to support you with love and compassion at every moment.
whatToBringTitle: What to Bring: Your Ceremony Kit
whatToBringSubtitle: Prepare these items to ensure your comfort and focus during the experience.
comfortItemsList: A blanket and a pillow or cushion
A notebook and pen for journaling
essentialsList: Change of clothes for the next day
An open heart and a willingness to heal
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer these questions honestly. This information is confidential and will help us ensure the ceremony is safe and beneficial for you.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any significant medical conditions (heart, blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (including antidepressants)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: Please list the medications you are taking.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of psychiatric conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, etc.)?
questionnaireExperience: Have you had previous experiences with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention for participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your answers have been saved successfully.
questionnaireErrorDescription: There was an error saving your answers.
mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to view this page.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed an important step on your path. To continue, we invite you to review our preparation guide.
promptRegisterDescription: Create an account to save your progress, book ceremonies, and receive personalized guidance on your path of transformation.
chatbotWelcome: Welcome. I am your spiritual guide. How can I help you on your healing journey today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.

whatsappInviteMessage: Hello! We invite you to complete our health questionnaire to continue with your process at El Arte de Sanar. You can fill it out here:
noAnswersSubmitted: No answers have been submitted for this user yet.

tourWelcomeDescription: Let's take a quick tour of our sacred space.
tourPhoneNumberLabel: First, could you provide us with your phone number?
tourPhoneNumberDescription: This will help us stay in touch about your process.
tourStepPastCeremonies: Here you can see memories of our past ceremonies. Feel the energy!
tourStepUpcomingCeremonies: And here are our next ceremonies. This is where your journey could begin.
tourStepFinal: Your tour is complete! The next step is to fill out the health questionnaire to continue your process.
exploreMedicineDescription: Learn about the sacred plant, its benefits, and its ancestral wisdom.
exploreCeremoniesDescription: Discover our upcoming dates and the details of each sacred encounter.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the spiritual guardians who will accompany you on your journey.
